name: mackenzie akira
text: Only place that I found so far in California that had dine in, so that was nice. Keto pizza was okay but wasn’t really my thing. The white sauce pizza was good. The place was nice, had a nice color scheme. They seemed pretty busy and it …More

name: Mary J
text: Its pretty decent pizza. I like the fact that you can create your own personal pizza. I finally get to have what I want on my pizza and not what my kids want. I recommend going into this place and ordering your pizza. Otherwise you're going …More

name: Cory
text: The wife and I decided to give Blaze another chance. We always seem to have issues when I go there. This time we ordered for pick up. Arrived at the recommended 20 minutes. They forgot to make our order. So waited another 10 minutes. Got …More

name: blackisses13
text: Tried to give blaze another chance cause we found out we cant eat the crust at mod. Haven't eaten at blaze in a long time since they never really make it right, but figured its been a year or so, why not try it? Pay $4 more for gluten free …More

name: Cass Nicoya
text: Pizza was delicious and filling. You get to create your own! The guy that helped us was a tad stingy. had to tell him to keep adding onions like 4 times.  But the food itself was yummy!

name: Shadan Alkassim
text:
Won’t order again
This was to go order so I did not see my pizza till I got home. It’s swimming in vinaigrette drizzle. I tried to eat one slice all I can taste is the vinegar.  You be the judge & look at the pizza.

name: John Harris
text: Pizza was very bland and the toppings were lacking in flavor. Also the service was very slow. 1st and last time visiting this place

name: Kaivan Gala
text: Great place to customize your pizza. The staff here was good to help us to choose our toppings and sauces on our pizza.

name: Kelly Owens
text: First off I would like to say Blaze has always been my go to pizza place in Tracy. However, the quality of their pizza can no longer make up for their lack of customer service and disorganization. Up until now, I have excused the semi-rude …More

name: Patricia Amador
text: Was driving thru Tracy from Modesto was craving pizza and seen the sign for blaze pizza. Oh Em Gee! Very yummy! I ordered the half pizza and garlic knots plenty for a lunch. I like that pizzas can be customizable which is great I will definitely stop by again if I'm in town

name: Larrolyn Ford
text: My mother has been talking up this place for a while now. Not sure when they open but she frequents this place quite a lot. When I came home from college, it was the first place that she decided to take me to. I have customizable pizza with …More

name: Guy Ewert
text: This place is obviously one of the most pleasant place in the area. Anytime I come there I am remarkably pleased. They maintain their high  standard service and the highest level of meals  they serve. You always win with this restaurant. Warmly  recommended.

name: Jessica
text: Vegan options!! Plus they offer Doordash

name: Jessica Mazur
text: First time ordering Blaze Pizza. The order was supposed to be ready in 22-27 minutes. After 3 phone calls, the pizzas are brought to the car an hour later. We ordered 4 garlic knots and didn’t get those. Poor service and disappointed.

name: SANDEEP RAJ
text: Thin crust, medium size, veggie pizza is only onions mushrooms and Brussel sprout leaves.. Tasty, not so heavy or calories.. I feel they add bit less cheese, little more (not too much) would be good.. got one pizza double toasted so it was crispy and good..

name: Erick Zepeda
text: The service was good, I ordered the cauliflower crust, the crust is tasteless, bland, I've had better at another place, disappointed!

name: Rengesh K
text: Great selection for pizza. Vegan and vegetarian options too. Quick service and tasty food.

name: Teri Sparkman
text: The service is fast & the pizzas are delicious. I like the fact that I can choose the amount of any toppings I want.

name: Ernest Aldama
text: Even with COVID-19 precautions, my pizza came out quick and hot.

name: Husna Ahmadi
text:
they are burning the back side of pizza
It was taste horrible

name: Lil Weedy
text: Just like subway but for pizza, simple and convenient... and friendly service

name: Cowboy Dan
text: Staff here is completely incompetent. Never answer the phone and always gets my order wrong... I'll spend my hard earned money elsewhere.

name: William Spragge
text: I ordered a to go pizza on 7/12 that was messed up (added foods I can't eat). Went back today on 7/30 and the team was very cool about it and made it right. Thanks Blaze Pizza team in Tracy!!!!

name: Carolyn Parms
text: Ok, Blaze Pizza is tasty. I didn't like the somewhat confusing ordering process or the noise. I ordered a pesto garlic ricotta artichoke pizza. It was very good. I looked at the other meat toppings  but was not impressed. Their prepared …More

name: Higinia Valdez
text: For one price, you can put as many toppings as you want and the pizza is so tasty. I loved the crust.

name: vrheims
text: I love the "build your own" pizza and i had the one with white cream. It was good! I just wished i didn't have to order on-line when i was already there. It didn't make sense to me ordering through the website when they could've taken my order.

name: Sai RG
text:
I never had such a chewy pizza.
It's gross...and very disappointed 👎👎

name: Logan Takaoka
text: Best pizzas ever. I love how you can make your own add as much as you want and put what you want. The cook it perfectly everytime. Super nice service. I love eating here its one of my favorite places to eat

name: Christy Yoshimoto
text: Good pizza, like ordering online for pick up. Only issue is that my pizza is never how I ordered. :'(

name: Dilinger Studio Making changes
text: Love the fresh dough, the 3 different sauce choices (marinara, garlic pesto and Alfredo sauce) variety of toppings to choose from and they also have a cauliflower pizza dough for a low carb choice,  but DOES NOT sacrifice flavor by any …More

name: Joshua Yuan
text: Quick service and nice staff. Food quality is pretty standard. Go LeBron!

name: Tammy Altes
text: This is the best pizza I have ever had.  Amazing choice of toppings.  Perfect crust.  Vegan cheese option.  Truly perfect.

name: Kathy Lefall
text: I'm giving it two stars because they finally had a gluten free dough.  Well this time  my online order was NOT ready and when i got there the clerk said it was in the oven when i could tell it wasnt.  my pizza finally was put in the oven …More

name: Boni Hamilton
text: Food  is always fresh and the service is friendly. Music and surroundings are current and comfortable for a Saturday afternoon.

name: Mr. Wolf

name: Cathy Caay
text: First time here. You can create your own pizza or order their signature pizza. Service was good and they are fast with your food even the pizza. Salad is good too. I thought the pizza was yummy, will definitely come back.

name: Dennis & Donna Gravett

name: Anthony Ruybal
text: Great food , Hard workers ! Definitely recommend Anthony to be a manager there

name: Joseph Latner
text: The pizza was extremely well made and you could tell the ingredients were fresh common not frozen. The staff super polite and extremely customer centered. I really like the sauce on the all white pizza, it really made the flavors on top and the crispy crust Taste even better.

name: Paul Oshiro
text: Been here more than a few times. It started out a near 5-star but has slowly moved down to a borderline 2-star. …More

text: Always good fresh ingredient pizza for low prices. If you haven't tried, it is definitely worth it.

name: Eliseo Torres
text: Good pizza. They were low on ingredients when I was there. But over all it was a good pizza.

name: John Wall
text: I just love their pizza... Crisp dough, great flavor in their sauces, and topping look fresh. They did forget to put my arugula on and I didnt notice till I got home... But it still tasted good!

name: Denise King
text: I usually like this place for a quick bite that i'm sure my two little ones will enjoy... but one piece of advice: if a pizza is made incorrectly, remake it quickly and assure that the customer gets it right away! I asked that the pizza …More

name: Dave L
text: Love this place. The service is pretty quick and the pizza is awesome. You can build your own. I always get the gluten free crust because the texture is amazing. I can totally eat gluten. Custom pizza faster than any other pizza place I have ever been to.

name: Ronald Ocon
text: Always have enjoyed Blaze Pizza since I've tried it the first time a couple months back and now I can't get enough. Their spicy red sauce is delicious if you like an extra kick in your pizza, as well as their balsamic drizzle after your pizza is done. Endless amounts of combinations for all pizza lovers.

name: Robert O'Connor

name: Alex Pickle
text: It was alright for my boyfriend who they loaded on the toppings for. But they left my pizza pretty bare (we had both done custom). The pizza was so-so in flavor and quality, it was a rather underwhelming experience.

name: Anthony Rosales
text: My go to when on the road, you can never go wrong with Blaze.  I love  the fact they have fresh mozzarella cheese!

name: Dhandapani Ponnurangam
text: Fresh Pizza, baked right in front of your eyes, for people who like some raw flavor (of the smoke). Pick your toppings and go for it. Will recommend if you know what you can expect from a pizza made traditional way.

name: Scott B
text: Good pizza and its quick specially when your in a hurry at lunch.

name: Allison Lujan Pereira
text: Made to order pizza is the best.

text: Wonderful customer service and nice,  clean and quiet.

name: Dave Moore
text: Great pizza! Excellent service and fast. The concept is perfect for families because each pizza is personal so the kids can have simple toppings while the adults can enjoy the many variations that are available.

text: Great selection of quality toppings. You can have them assemble pretty much anything you want! They do need to fix some seating that is falling apart...

name: Kevin G
text: I've found Blaze Pizza locations to be incredibly hit and miss in cleanliness and service. If one could quantify these things, this location is very average. Half of my visits are great, the other half not so great. Most recent visit was a …More

text: I'm a fan of Blaze Pizza now,  always taste great, love all the variety.  The menu is simple but since you can pick and add whatever you'd like opens up options.  Love thin crust pizza's but was also told they can double the crust if you …More

text: We really like the pizza there especially the gluten-free unfortunately this time my pizza was a bit under cooked but still very good.

text: They think we're prankin them on the phone  even though we are not prankin them

text: Online ordering is the only access to order. No phone orders available. Website is horrible, not user friendly. At confirm order stage it auto changes things and won't let you correct it. There is no access to restaurant if there is an error on order when it auto changed.

name: Domingo Ramos
text:
Love Blaze Pizza!! Just found out about them a bit ago. Where was I living, under a rock?
It's a pizza lover's paradise. People behind the counter are great, food is always fresh and the place is always so welcoming and clean.

name: Jordan Kwan

text: Amazing service and great option for fresh pizzas. You can choose from the menu or create your own. Either way you will end up with freshly baked pizza. text: Rude staff, store is filthy, my pizza was burnt and over priced for extra toppings! Worst  pizza experience ever! Don’t waste you time go to MOD, it’s much cleaner and it’s UNLIMITED toppings!

name: Raul Ramirez
text: It's just that good

name: Nichole Rogers
text: Service was slow, but it was a fundraiser night, so they could be the reason. People were friendly and attentive. The pizza was decent. The gluten-free crust was really, really thin. They were stingy with the toppings. My spinach was burnt.

text: Build your own. Craft pizza.    Best place ive been in awhile

text: Pizza was great! Great prices! Friendly and gorgeous inside! Went near closing time when it was slower so it was fast too! Great experience.

name: R. Free

name: Robert 394

text: Blaze is a sure fire place to eat. I was introduced out in Kentucky and amazing. Only issue I have with here is hella stingy with all ingredients.. 2 of the employees seemed hella irritated, but the others were super nice. The gentleman that was on the fire pit was super sweet and at least made conversation and made feel welcome!

name: John Sonbar
text: Always great service and speedy order processing, it always amazes me hoe fast they crank orders out. So glad to have one of these in our town. Toppings are always tasty and they sure do load up the pizza when asked.

text: Pizza is good. A little pricey. Had a $5.00 off coupon and still paid $6.00. Service is generally good and friendly.

text:
